verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love Him in the morning When you see the sun a’risin. Love Him in the evening ‘Cause He took you thru’ the day.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And in the in-between times When you feel the pressures coming Remember that He loves you And He promises to stay.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When you think you’ve got to worry ‘Cause it seems the thing to do Remember He’s not in a hurry He’s always got time for you.{/lang-eng}
